com.yworks.yfiles.graph.labelmodels

Class EdgePathLabelModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.graph.labelmodels.EdgePathLabelModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILookup, ILabelModel, ILabelModelParameterFinder, ILabelModelParameterProvider

    public class EdgePathLabelModel
extends Object
implements ILabelModel, ILabelModelParameterProvider, ILabelModelParameterFinder
    An edge label model that allows placement of labels along the edge path at a set of continuous positions at specified sides of the edge path.

    The set of positions can be influenced by specifying the SideOfEdge value that controls on which side of the edge labels positions should be considered. Furthermore, it's possible to specify distance values that control the distance between label and edge and between label and nodes.

    If a label model parameter is created EdgeSides.ON_EDGE, the label's center is usually placed on the edge. It can be shifted by specifying a Offset value but the Distance value is ignored. For all other values of EdgeSides the total distance between the label bounds and the edge path is the sum of Offset and Distance.

    The label placements use a ratio value as fraction of the full edge path length. This is the main difference to the EdgePathLabelModel which uses a specified segment index from the source or target side and a ratio on this segment.

      • EdgePathLabelModel

      • EdgePathLabelModel

        public EdgePathLabelModel(double distance,
                          double offset,
                          double angle,
                          boolean autoRotationEnabled,
                          EdgeSides sideOfEdge)
        Initializes a new instance of the EdgePathLabelModel class.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance to the edge.
        offset - the offset to the default placement.
        angle - the angle of the label's rotation in radians.
        autoRotationEnabled - if set to true auto rotation is enabled.
        sideOfEdge - the side of the edge labels.

    • Method Detail

      • createDefaultParameter

        public final ILabelModelParameter createDefaultParameter()
        A model parameter that encodes the default position of this model's allowed edge label positions.

        Returns a model parameter that encodes the default position of this model's allowed edge label positions.

        Specified by:
        createDefaultParameter in interface ILabelModel
        Returns:
        a parameter for this model instance

      • createRatioParameter

        public final ILabelModelParameter createRatioParameter(double edgePathRatio,
                                                       EdgeSides sideOfEdge)
        Creates a parameter at the provided edge path ratio.
        Parameters:
        edgePathRatio - The ratio at which to place the label at the edge path. A ratio of 0.0 will place the label at the source side of the edge path, a ratio of 1.0 at the target side.
        sideOfEdge - The side of the edge the label is placed on. Note that only single enum values but no combined ones are allowed.
        Returns:
        A label parameter at the provided edge path ratio for this model instance.

      • findBestParameter

        public final ILabelModelParameter findBestParameter(ILabel label,
                                                    ILabelModel model,
                                                    IOrientedRectangle layout)
        Description copied from interface: ILabelModelParameterFinder
        Tries to find a parameter that best matches the given layout for the provided label instance.

        This method may not necessarily find a parameter that matches the provided layout exactly. Implementations may choose to simply return the model's default parameter but may never return null.

        Specified by:
        findBestParameter in interface ILabelModelParameterFinder
        Parameters:
        label - The label to find a parameter for.
        model - The model instance to use. This should be the instance this instance has been obtained from.
        layout - The anticipated layout for the label.
        Returns:
        A non-null parameter that can be used for the label to approximate the provided layout.

      • getDistance

        public final double getDistance()
        Gets the distance between the label box and the edge path.

        The interpretation of the values depends on the SideOfEdge of the individual ILabelModelParameter.

        Note that for EdgeSides.ON_EDGE this property is ignored. For all other values of EdgeSides the Offset property is added to this distance.

        Returns:
        The distance between the label box and the edge path.
        See Also:
        getSideOfEdge(), EdgeSides, getOffset(), setDistance(double)

      • getGeometry

        public final IOrientedRectangle getGeometry(ILabel label,
                                            ILabelModelParameter layoutParameter)
        Description copied from interface: ILabelModel
        Calculates the geometry of the given label using the given model parameter.
        Specified by:
        getGeometry in interface ILabelModel
        Parameters:
        label - The label to calculate the geometry for.
        layoutParameter - A parameter that is compatible with this model. Typically, this is a parameter that has been created by this model, and its property Model returns this instance.
        Returns:
        An IOrientedRectangle that describes the geometry of the label. This is typically designed as a flyweight, therefore clients should not cache the instance but store the values if they need a snapshot for later use.

      • getOffset

        public final double getOffset()
        Gets pr sets the offset of the label box and the edge path relative to the default placement.

        For EdgeSides.ON_EDGE this is the offset between the center of the label box and the edge path. For all other EdgeSides values this offset is added to the Distance property which results in the total distance between the label box and the edge path.

        Returns:
        The offset of the label box and the edge path relative to the default placement.
        See Also:
        getSideOfEdge(), EdgeSides, setOffset(double)

      • getParameters

        public final IEnumerable<ILabelModelParameter> getParameters(ILabel label,
                                                             ILabelModel model)
        Description copied from interface: ILabelModelParameterProvider
        Returns an enumerator over a set of possible ILabelModelParameter instances that can be used for the given label and model.
        Specified by:
        getParameters in interface ILabelModelParameterProvider
        Parameters:
        label - The label instance to use.
        model - The model to provide parameters for.
        Returns:
        A possibly empty enumerator over a set of label model parameters.

      • getSideOfEdge

        public final EdgeSides getSideOfEdge()
        Gets the side placement specifiers for edge labels.

        The label model parameter finder and provider returned by lookup(Class) consider the specified sides.

        Returns:
        The SideOfEdge.
        See Also:
        EdgeSides, setSideOfEdge(EdgeSides)

      • isAutoRotationEnabled

        public final boolean isAutoRotationEnabled()
        Gets whether edge labels are automatically rotated according to the angle of the corresponding reference edge segment.

        By default, this feature is enabled.

        Returns:
        true if edge labels are automatically rotated; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        setAutoRotationEnabled(boolean)

      • lookup

        public final <TLookup> TLookup lookup(Class<TLookup> type)
        Description copied from interface: ILookup
        Returns an instance that implements the given type or null. Typically, this method will be called in order to obtain a different view or aspect of the current instance. This is quite similar to casting or using a super type or interface of this instance, but is not limited to inheritance or compile time constraints. An instance implementing this method is not required to return non-null implementations for the types, nor does it have to return the same instance any time. Also it depends on the type and context whether the instance returned stays up to date or needs to be reobtained for subsequent use.
        Specified by:
        lookup in interface ILookup
        Parameters:
        type - the type for which an instance shall be returned
        Returns:
        an instance that is assignable to type or null
